channel.title: research on Frederik la Cour
channel.description: Recent content in research on Frederik la Cour

item.title: Audiodesign: Masters thesis
item.description: In my thesis I am investigating Poul la Cour’s “tonestrøms-apparat” through media archaeological methods grounded in patent drawings, reproduction and re-enactment with the aim to demonstrate “tonestrøms-apparatets” epistemological implications of our understanding of contemporary digital medias.

item.title: Wave Field Synthesis experiments
item.description: Researching and experimenting with wave field synthesis at Aarhus University
